title: Does anyone have a recommendation for an offline game like LoL?
body:
Been having internet issues that moved me to a 20 min wait. Seeing as I don't want to ruin other people's online game, I'm gonna hold off for a bit (RIP the grind to gold - was so close at silver 1). Meanwhile, I'm looking for any games similar to the Moba experience of making builds, fighting enemies, isometric camera style for PC. Diablo 3 was great as well as divinity original sin but are there any recommendations?

If it helps, I'm like playing Ekko, Vi, Nautilus, Pantheon, Braum, J4.

replies.body: agree completly with warcraft 3.  I actually started playing mobas with Dota when it was still with warcraft 3 frozen throne.  The custom maps are great.
Warcraft 3 custom maps, old but gold
